io.gearpump.streaming.state.api

Class PersistentTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.task.Task
      • io.gearpump.streaming.state.api.PersistentTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskInterface

    public abstract class PersistentTask<T>
extends Task
    PersistentTask is part of the transaction API

    Users should extend this task if they want to get transaction support from the framework

      • persistentState

        public abstract PersistentState<T> persistentState()
        Subclass should override this method to pass in a PersistentState. the framework has already offered two states: - NonWindowState: state with no time or other boundary - WindowState: each state is bounded by a time window
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • processMessage

        public abstract void processMessage(PersistentState<T> state,
                                    Message message)
        Subclass should override this method to specify how a new message should update state
        Parameters:
        state - (undocumented)
        message - (undocumented)

      • onStart

        public final void onStart(java.time.Instant startTime)
        Description copied from interface: TaskInterface
        Method called with the task is initialized.
        Specified by:
        onStart in interface TaskInterface
        Overrides:
        onStart in class Task
        Parameters:
        startTime - startTime that can be used to decide from when a source producer task should replay the data source, or from when a processor task should recover its checkpoint data in to in-memory state.

      • onNext

        public final void onNext(Message message)
        Description copied from interface: TaskInterface
        Method called for each message received.

      • onWatermarkProgress

        public final void onWatermarkProgress(java.time.Instant watermark)
        Description copied from interface: TaskInterface
        Method called on watermark update. Usually safe to output or checkpoint states earlier than watermark.

        Specified by:
        onWatermarkProgress in interface TaskInterface
        Overrides:
        onWatermarkProgress in class Task
        Parameters:
        watermark - represents event time progress.

      • onStop

        public final void onStop()
        Description copied from interface: TaskInterface
        Method called when task is under clean up.

        This can be used to cleanup resource when the application finished.

        Specified by:
        onStop in interface TaskInterface
        Overrides:
        onStop in class Task
